channel.title: Abouts on Kunhao Zheng

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a 4th-year student in École Polytechnique in France, enrolled in the “Cycle D’Ingénieur” Program. I am also a 2nd-year Master student in Shanghai Jiao Tong University as part of my double-degree program. I have a general background in computer science and mathematics. I obtained my Bachelor degree in a Sino-French institute in Shanghai Jiao Tong University, where I received intense training of mathematics and physics before I entered into researh.
